description: No matter who they are: Da Bomb, Da Bom or THE BOMB, let them know it with the Decade Awards Black Bomb Trophy! This texturized, BLACK finished, Bomb Trophy is the excellent choice for anyone who makes an impact (or crater)!  The MATTE BLACK BOMB is a resin cast design on a reddish tone base...it even has a REAL STRING FUSE! The total height is 5.5 inches tall and has a 4.5 x 4.5 wide RED BASE.  Create a PERSONALIZED message, acknowledge a triumph or recognize an outstanding performance with four (4) lines of engraving containing up to thirty-five (35) characters and spaces per line on a 3.375" x 1.25" x 2.875" trapezoid gold finish engraving plate. The trophy will arrive with the plate attached to the base. Simply click on the CUSTOMIZE NOW button to create YOUR special message to anyone who is a BLAST to work or play with; let them know how much you appreciate their explosive personality’ A DYNAMITE award for your movers and shakers; it is an ideal trophy for all types of social, sporting or business events! Celebrate Life’s Victories with Decade Awards!
